page.title: 01GAZETTEER NETT'M & DISTRICT
page.content: Nettleham pop.3480 lies in a valley beside the beck,between A46 and A158 This position,north of Lincoln,makes it popular with commuters.A nucleus of C18th+19th cottages around the church has increased with modern estates.Important in Mediaeval times, with its Bishop's Manor,whose ruins remain,it is once more the centre for the surrounding district.Scothern pop. 710 too has old cottages clustered around st.Chad's church and the beck, but is without large modern estates. With its Public House,Village hall and school it is a pleasant place in which to live.Sudbrooke pop.890 lies between the A158 & Scothern lane.Many detached houses have been built in the grounds of the former Sudbrooke park.It has St.Edwards church,scout camp and riding school.A village hall and playing field are planned.
